languages.text: "Да чтоб я знал! Старик был не любитель говорить по душам. До самого объявления последней воли я понятия не имел, что впал в немилость".
"As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."
languages.original_text: "Да чтоб я знал! Старик был не любитель говорить по душам. До самого объявления последней воли я понятия не имел, что впал в немилость".

traits.locale_text: "Like I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart person. Right up to the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he was cross with me."
"Like I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart person. Right up to the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he was cross with me."
"As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."
"As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."
"As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."

languages.text: “我要是知道就好了！那个老家伙心里揣着什么从来都不说出来。在宣布他的最终遗嘱之前，我甚至都不知道他准备把我一脚踹到狗窝里。”
languages.original_text: "As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."

traits.locale_text: “我要是知道就好了！那个老家伙心里揣着什么从来都不说出来。在宣布他的最终遗嘱之前，我甚至都不知道他准备把我一脚踹到狗窝里。”

languages.text: «¡Ojalá lo supiera! El viejo no era muy de hablar de sus cosas. Hasta justo antes de que se anunciara su testamento, no tenía ni idea de que había renegado de mí».
languages.original_text: "As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ojalá lo supiera! El viejo no era muy de hablar de sus cosas. Hasta justo antes de que se anunciara su testamento, no tenía ni idea de que había renegado de mí».

languages.text: 「知るかよ！親父は自分の気持ちをあけっぴろげに話すような奴じゃなかった。遺言が発表されるまでは、まさか俺を犬小屋送りにするとは思わなかったよ」
languages.original_text: "As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."

traits.locale_text: 「知るかよ！親父は自分の気持ちをあけっぴろげに話すような奴じゃなかった。遺言が発表されるまでは、まさか俺を犬小屋送りにするとは思わなかったよ」

languages.text: "Wenn ich das wüsste! Der alte Mann war kein mitteilsamer Mensch. Bis zur Verkündung seines Testaments hatte ich keine Ahnung, dass mir nur die Hundehütte bleibt."
languages.original_text: "As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich das wüsste! Der alte Mann war kein mitteilsamer Mensch. Bis zur Verkündung seines Testaments hatte ich keine Ahnung, dass mir nur die Hundehütte bleibt."

languages.text: « Comme si je le savais ! Il n'était pas du genre à se confier, vous voyez. J'ignorais que j 'avais été relégué à la niche jusqu'à l'annonce de ses dernières volontés et de son testament. »
languages.original_text: "As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."

traits.locale_text: « Comme si je le savais ! Il n'était pas du genre à se confier, vous voyez. J'ignorais que j 'avais été relégué à la niche jusqu'à l'annonce de ses dernières volontés et de son testament. »

languages.text: "Ah bir bilsem! İhtiyar pek candan bir insan değildi. Son arzusu ve vasiyetnamesi duyurulana kadar beni gözden çıkartacağını tahmin etmemiştim."
languages.original_text: "As if I know! The old man wasn't a heart-to-heart sort of person. Right up until the announcement of his last will and testament, I had no idea he'd put me in the doghouse."

traits.locale_text: "Ah bir bilsem! İhtiyar pek samimi bir insan değildi. Son arzusu ve vasiyetnamesi duyurulana kadar beni böyle sırtımdan bıçaklayacağını tahmin etmemiştim."
